title: Part motion given logarithmic velocity f part - a

content.description: A particle moves along the x-axis so that its velocity v at time t, for 0≤t≤5 , is given by v(t)=ln(t2-3t+3). The particle is at position x=8 at time t=0.
content.question: (a) Find the acceleration of the particle at time t = 4.

frqParts.text: (a) Find the acceleration of the particle at time t = 4.

topic.text: 4.2: Straight-Line Motion - Connecting Position, Velocity, and Acceleration

skill.text: Skill 1.E: Apply appropriate mathematical rules or procedures, with and without technology.
